description: APPLICATION FOR PRIOR APPROVAL IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION WITH A DEPTH OF 6M, MAXIMUM HEIGHT OF 3M AND EAVES HEIGHT OF 2.7M.
decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: 

By reason of lack of details of existing and proposed materials of the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse, the scheme fails to comply with criteria A.3 (a) of Class A Schedule 2 Part 1 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended). As such, the proposed single storey rear extension would fail to comply with the provisions of the conditions, limitations or restrictions application to development permitted by Class A which exceeds the limits in paragraph A1(f) but is allowed by paragraph A.1(g) of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended). 
Reason : 2 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: 

By reason of inaccurate measurements for the maximum and eaves height of the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse, the scheme fails to comply with criteria A.4 (2)(a)(ii) and (iii) of Class A Schedule 2 Part 1 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended). As such, the proposed single storey rear extension would fail to comply with the provisions of the conditions, limitations or restrictions application to development permitted by Class A which exceeds the limits in paragraph A1(f) but is allowed by paragraph A.1(g) of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
